author: dlr
msg: Broadened interface of get(String key, ArrayList args) to get(String
key, List args) to handle a wider variety of List implementations
(it's not only Velocity code which may be calling this method).

author: sidler
msg: Added package tools. This is intended to host various reusable context
tools. Currently hosted tools are DateTool, MathTool, RequestParser and
ToolLoader. All tools are optimized to be used with an auto-loading toolbox
manager and come with documentation for the template designers. A

author: dlr
msg: Bumped the version number for addition of I18N view functionality.
